## BaseDAO.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BaseDAO` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(tableName: string, C: {
        new (configObject: any): Datamodel;
    });
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tableName | string | The namespace of where the documents should be saved. In MariaDB the documents are persistet in tables. |
|  C | { new (configObject: any): Datamodel; } | The class of the datamodel |
